key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on international suppliers
Market volatility from fluctuations in avocado prices
Regulatory and legal risks, including compliance with international trade regulations
controversies: Environmental concerns related to deforestation and high water usage
Labor practices in farming operations, particularly in regions with less stringent regulations
Legal challenges, such as the complaint filed by the Organic Consumers Association
environmental_issues: Deforestation and high water usage in avocado farming
social_issues: Labor conditions in farming operations, especially in regions with weaker regulations
governance_issues: Proactive steps to address illegal deforestation in Michoacán, Mexico

sources.title: Mission Produce® Implements Policy Addressing Illegal Deforestation
sources.snippet: Oxnard, Calif. - November 8, 2024 - Mission Produce, Inc. (NASDAQ: AVO) ("Mission" or "the Company") a world leader in sourcing, producing, and distributing fresh Hass avocados, today announced the implementation of a policy aimed at addressing illegal deforestation associated with avocado farming in Michoacán, Mexico.

sources.title: Mission Produce implements policy addressing illegal deforestation

sources.title: Mission Produce® Implements Policy Addressing Illegal Deforestation
sources.snippet: Mission Produce (NASDAQ: AVO), a leading Hass avocado distributor, has implemented a policy to combat illegal deforestation in Michoacán, Mexico's primary avocado-producing region. The company will prohibit sourcing from 279 orchards identified by the State Ministry of Environment as linked to illegal deforestation.
